title: Advances in Type 2 Diabetes Management
abstract: This study reviews the efficacy of Metformin combined with lifestyle changes. Results show a 20% reduction in HbA1c levels compared to lifestyle changes alone.

title: Hypertension and Dietary Salt Intake
abstract: A cohort study demonstrating a significant correlation between high sodium intake (>5g/day) and elevated systolic blood pressure in adults over 40.

title: AI in Radiology
abstract: Deep learning models applied to chest X-rays have achieved diagnostic parity with board-certified radiologists for detecting pneumonia.
